metadata.title: Mustafa Kamal calls on PM Shehbaz Sharif

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Aug 1 (APP): Federal Minister for National Health Services Regulations and Coordination Syed Mustafa Kamal Friday called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif and discussed matters relating to the ministry. During the meeting Syed Mustafa Kamal briefed the prime minister on progress of the ongoing projects and reforms in health sector.
